attributes.action: Require all employers to give 20 days annual holiday not including Bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers are legally required to give staff 20 days a year holiday but by including Bank Holidays in this number there are only 12 days holiday that can be booked. This allows employers to get out of giving the full 20 days holiday intended by the law.
